name: Only Once You Live
description:
You've found yourself in a dark underworld with once chance to make it through a trickster's platform city. Can you do it? You only live once, after all.

Credits:
Main idea and art: Alias
Lead Programmer: ACour0008
Support Dev: Kokowawa
